ygData.subject: Re: a player gets 'Warned' for pet killing exploit
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed. you did the right thing. case in point of petitioning: a few nights ago on cazic-thule, a lvl 13 bard named Reverith was training Sand Giants in North
ygData.messageBody:
agreed. you did the right thing.

case in point of petitioning:

a few nights ago on cazic-thule, a lvl 13 bard named Reverith was training
Sand Giants in North Ro. he'd grab 2 of them, and have them chase him all
over North Ro. he would either zone or die every time, but not until after
he trained the giants onto dozens of people. i beleive 30 or 40 people
petitioned about it, and i havent seen him on since.

another issue i've had is with kill stealing. one player constantly steals
kills from me. he just plain doesnt like me, and i believe it was because i
shouted he was a kill thief (after he tried to steal one of my kills, then
challenged me to a duel which i did not accept, after which he promptly
stole my next kill). from that time on he's decided to steal any kill i am
getting while i solo and he is around. i petitioned it but to no avail. so
the only thing i can do is wait till one day when he needs help, and i can
watch him die =)

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 15th lvl (or 16th depending on the time of
day, hehe) enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 09:41 AM 4/29/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
>You did the right thing. If he wants all the critters to himself
>he needs to be playing Baldur's Gate. Unfortunately, some
>people don't have what's called 'da social skilz'. That's why
>they don't have no friends.. 'cept for their mamas...
>
>Couldn't resist pulling that line from 'The Waterboy'.. hehe..

tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
